radiographic_examinations.findings: Outer retinal atrophy, disruption of the ellipsoid zone (EZ), yellow drusen-like deposits in the macula, and peripheral retinal pigment epithelial (RPE) changes in both eyes.
Yellow drusen-like deposits in the macula and peripheral retinal pigment epithelial (RPE) changes in both eyes.
14 mmHg in the right eye and 15 mmHg in the left eye.
Mild telecanthus and pigment mottling in the macula of both eyes.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up examinations at 1 year and 2 years noted similar bilateral pigmentary changes in the macula.
